channel.title: Making commands on creativescape?
channel.description:
How do i make commands on creativescape? Oh and before you start flaming: Creativescape is NOT delta and its NOT emolous and stuff like that. It is shard revolution based.
An example of 2 commands i want added is pickup and maxed

item.title: Making commands on creativescape?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:345062”][quote author=h3rbl0re link=topic=441440.msg3242721#msg3242721 date=1277060731]
It still tells me to reload the client…
[/quote]Why don’t you make a new thread or PM the guy, rather than go off-topic.[/quote]

Yea, PM me if u need hlep with the client. Now back to the topic, the errors are fixed, but now it says: command should be in pickup.java. Now i deleted that and it says: command pickup not found.

Read full topic

item.title: Making commands on creativescape?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

h3rbl0re:

Offtopic, adrian, how did you even get your client to load? It says “please reload your client” when i try to load it.

Yea, its easy to load the client. Add the cache to: C:\WINDOWS\crs_cache2_32

Well then post the errors? It's commands.java obviously...
K, sec lemme get a pic.

My pic disappeard. Anyways i fixed the bugs. Now its 1 left… when i add to commands.java it says the command should be in pickup.java. But when i do that… it can’t find the command

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“adrian1372, post:3, topic:345062”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=441440.msg3242686#msg3242686 date=1277059416]
Client.java search around for commands.
[/quote]

I said its not Like delta… This 1 doesnt have client.java… its in commands.java.

I found txt files for commands, but that commands dnt work. I added them to commands.java and got some errors.[/quote]Well then post the errors? It’s commands.java obviously…

Read full topic
